events.name: Brittney Griner Released in Prisoner Swap with Russian Arms Dealer Viktor Bout
events.wd_label: Brittney Griner Released in Prisoner Swap with Russian Arms Dealer Viktor Bout
events.wd_description: WNBA player Brittney Griner was released as part of a prisoner swap between the US and Russia, involving the exchange of Griner for Russian arms dealer Viktor Bout.
events.description: WNBA player Brittney Griner was released as part of a prisoner swap between the US and Russia, involving the exchange of Griner for Russian arms dealer Viktor Bout.

events.name: Griner's Detention and Release
events.wd_description: Brittney Griner was detained in Russia in February on drug smuggling charges and sentenced to nine years in prison before being released in a prisoner swap in December.
events.description: Brittney Griner was detained in Russia in February on drug smuggling charges and sentenced to nine years in prison before being released in a prisoner swap in December.

events.name: Viktor Bout's Release
events.wd_description: Viktor Bout, a Russian arms dealer known as the "Merchant of Death," was released from a US prison as part of the prisoner swap, where he was serving a 25-year sentence for serious crimes.
events.description: Viktor Bout, a Russian arms dealer known as the "Merchant of Death," was released from a US prison as part of the prisoner swap, where he was serving a 25-year sentence for serious crimes.

events.name: Diplomatic Tensions and Negotiations
events.wd_description: Griner's detention and subsequent release amid the Ukraine war led to significant diplomatic tensions between the US and Russia, with negotiations continuing despite the broader conflict.
events.description: Griner's detention and subsequent release amid the Ukraine war led to significant diplomatic tensions between the US and Russia, with negotiations continuing despite the broader conflict.

events.name: President Biden Accuses Oil Companies of War Profiteering
events.wd_label: President Biden Accuses Oil Companies of War Profiteering
events.wd_description: U.S. President Joe Biden accused oil companies of "war profiteering" and raised the possibility of a windfall tax if they do not increase domestic production to lower fuel costs.
events.description: U.S. President Joe Biden accused oil companies of "war profiteering" and raised the possibility of a windfall tax if they do not increase domestic production to lower fuel costs.

events.name: Biden's Accusation
events.wd_description: President Biden criticized oil companies for making record profits during the war while refusing to lower prices at the pump, accusing them of "war profiteering."
events.description: President Biden criticized oil companies for making record profits during the war while refusing to lower prices at the pump, accusing them of "war profiteering."

events.name: Windfall Tax Proposal
events.wd_description: Biden suggested that Congress could impose tax penalties on oil companies if they do not invest in lowering fuel costs for American citizens.
events.description: Biden suggested that Congress could impose tax penalties on oil companies if they do not invest in lowering fuel costs for American citizens.

events.name: ExxonMobil Criticism
events.wd_description: Biden specifically targeted ExxonMobil, which reported $19.7 billion in earnings in the third quarter, accusing the company of prioritizing shareholder dividends over increasing production.
events.description: Biden specifically targeted ExxonMobil, which reported $19.7 billion in earnings in the third quarter, accusing the company of prioritizing shareholder dividends over increasing production.

events.name: Xi Jinping Reveals New Leadership Team in China
events.wd_label: Xi Jinping Reveals New Leadership Team in China
events.wd_description: Chinese President Xi Jinping announced a new leadership team filled with loyal allies as he formally begins his unprecedented third term, consolidating power within the Communist Party.
events.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping announced a new leadership team filled with loyal allies as he formally begins his unprecedented third term, consolidating power within the Communist Party.

events.name: Leadership Announcement
events.wd_description: President Xi Jinping revealed a new leadership team after the Communist Party Congress, solidifying his control with six loyalists joining him in the Politburo Standing Committee.
events.description: President Xi Jinping revealed a new leadership team after the Communist Party Congress, solidifying his control with six loyalists joining him in the Politburo Standing Committee.

events.name: Politburo Standing Committee
events.wd_description: The new Politburo Standing Committee, China's top ruling body, is composed entirely of Xi Jinping's close allies, marking a significant consolidation of power.
events.description: The new Politburo Standing Committee, China's top ruling body, is composed entirely of Xi Jinping's close allies, marking a significant consolidation of power.

events.name: Gender Representation in Leadership
events.wd_description: The full lineup of the 24-member Politburo was revealed, with no women included for the first time in 25 years, highlighting the low level of female representation in China's top leadership.
events.description: The full lineup of the 24-member Politburo was revealed, with no women included for the first time in 25 years, highlighting the low level of female representation in China's top leadership.

events.name: CATL's German Factory Achieves Lithium-Ion Battery Cell Mass Production
events.wd_label: CATL's German Factory Achieves Lithium-Ion Battery Cell Mass Production
events.wd_description: CATL's first overseas factory in Thuringia, Germany, has successfully achieved mass production of lithium-ion battery cells, marking a significant milestone in CATL's global expansion.
events.description: CATL's first overseas factory in Thuringia, Germany, has successfully achieved mass production of lithium-ion battery cells, marking a significant milestone in CATL's global expansion.

events.name: Mass Production Achievement
events.wd_description: The first batch of battery cells from CATL's German factory was successfully produced by the first cell production line in the G2 building, with other production lines being installed and commissioned.
events.description: The first batch of battery cells from CATL's German factory was successfully produced by the first cell production line in the G2 building, with other production lines being installed and commissioned.

events.name: Production Line and Capacity Expansion
events.wd_description: CATL is working to ramp up the capacity of its German factory, which received an 8GWh cell production license in April and started module production in the G1 building in the third quarter of 2021.
events.description: CATL is working to ramp up the capacity of its German factory, which received an 8GWh cell production license in April and started module production in the G1 building in the third quarter of 2021.

events.name: Local Production and Supply Capability
events.wd_description: The successful production of these battery cells signifies CATL's ability to produce and supply locally for European customers, having passed all necessary global product tests.
events.description: The successful production of these battery cells signifies CATL's ability to produce and supply locally for European customers, having passed all necessary global product tests.
